cidney.org

Hi, I’m cidney, and this is my personal website.

I’m a freelance hacker by day. I used to be a web developer, but now I mostly make adventure games. My pronouns are she/her or they/them.

You can use this website to find out more about me, check out what I’m up to right now, get in touch with me, or even see what kind of tools I use.
